title: Olimp2009
author: Olimp2009
content: Hey, guys. I have a question for you, I hope you can help me.1) Please tell me about the conferences that will be held in India in the next few months. It can be not only big conferences.2) I represent Utopia project which has created a huge ecosystem and we need people from India who will be willing to represent us at conferences that will be held in India. We will pay for this. Please message me in this thread or on my telegram @JoBraverThank you and good luck in the cryptocurrency world.

comments.author: elevates
comments.body: Which one are you asking us as there are a multiple confrence happening. Now, there is a Blockchain summit happening in the month of November. Since you said in the upcoming week there is an event on 1st of September. The event is happening in Delhi,Crypto Weekend Launch. Are you referring to this event or something else. Please be more specific so that I can help you with it.

comments.author: Olimp2009
comments.body: Quote from: elevates on August 28, 2023, 01:12:52 PMWhich one are you asking us as there are a multiple confrence happening. Now, there is a Blockchain summit happening in the month of November. Since you said in the upcoming week there is an event on 1st of September. The event is happening in Delhi,Crypto Weekend Launch. Are you referring to this event or something else. Please be more specific so that I can help you with it. I'm talking about any conference of any size, even the smallest ones.

comments.author: Bureau
comments.body: Quote from: Olimp2009 on August 29, 2023, 09:44:38 AMQuote from: elevates on August 28, 2023, 01:12:52 PMWhich one are you asking us as there are a multiple confrence happening. Now, there is a Blockchain summit happening in the month of November. Since you said in the upcoming week there is an event on 1st of September. The event is happening in Delhi,Crypto Weekend Launch. Are you referring to this event or something else. Please be more specific so that I can help you with it. I'm talking about any conference of any size, even the smallest ones.What you can do is visit this website: coingabbar. Then use the filter option select confrence first then input the dates click on search. It will list down all confrence related to cryptocurrency globally. It will also provide you the organizers details and their website link. I saw the latest confrence in India is to be held in the month of September in Delhi. I hope it helps you. Thanks.

comments.author: Olimp2009
comments.body: Thank you, sir. You've been very helpful!I would like to remind everyone once again that if you live in India and are willing to attend the conference to present our project, then message me on Telegram @JoBraver.

comments.author: elevates
comments.body: Quote from: Olimp2009 on August 30, 2023, 09:00:23 AMThank you, sir. You've been very helpful!I would like to remind everyone once again that if you live in India and are willing to attend the conference to present our project, then message me on Telegram @JoBraver.A great project with an ability to become one of the best. Thanks for asking us and making us feel like we are required. I am sorry I was not able to help you personally. I hope you were able to find what you wanted from our community.members. If there is are confrence happening in southern part of India and if it happens in my city then expect me to contact you for free tickets. I hope you won't deny me at that time

comments.author: Olimp2009
comments.body: Quote from: elevates on August 30, 2023, 12:44:07 PMQuote from: Olimp2009 on August 30, 2023, 09:00:23 AMThank you, sir. You've been very helpful!I would like to remind everyone once again that if you live in India and are willing to attend the conference to present our project, then message me on Telegram @JoBraver.A great project with an ability to become one of the best. Thanks for asking us and making us feel like we are required. I am sorry I was not able to help you personally. I hope you were able to find what you wanted from our community.members. If there is are confrence happening in southern part of India and if it happens in my city then expect me to contact you for free tickets. I hope you won't deny me at that time  Thank you. I can't promise anything, I'm just HR. But email me and I'll be sure to tell my management about you

comments.author: Olimp2009
comments.body: We are continuing our search. If you are located in these regions, please contact me. Absolutely everyone is welcome and we are willing to consider any candidate.

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: There fend to be frequent Ethereum conferences in India from ETHGlobal, next is Dec 8-10th, you can check on websites [1] [2]. They have field on ethIndia, "interested in sponsoring?" — since ethereum is pretty huge sponsoring might help you a lot with visibility. [1] https://ethglobal.com/[2] https://ethindia.co/
